attributes.action:
No Deal Brexit!
Step up preparations for a No Deal Exit
attributes.additional_details:
That instruction should be to prepare our country for No Deal.
This would be in keeping with what the people voted for on June 23 2016 and deliver upon the biggest democratic vote in our history.
attributes.background:
Following the Government's defeat on the Prime Minister's Withdrawal Agreement, we call upon the Government to step up preparations for a No Deal Brexit.
This would enable our country to be fully prepared for March 29 2019.
There should only be one instruction to Civil Servants.
